original_title: Lunar: Rebalance & Recharge with Tara Lee - Lunar Nidra
overview: Yoga Nidra is a deeply restorative relaxation, excellent for reducing stress and exhaustion. You will scan different parts of your body with awareness and enter into a state of 'yogic sleep'. Practice before bed and anytime you need to recharge.
title: Lunar: Rebalance & Recharge with Tara Lee - Lunar Nidra
